mapper.select: SELECT oid, mid, ozipcode, oaddress1, oaddress2, odate, oreceiver, otel, ousedmileage, ousedcoupon, opayment, ostatus, oaccountdeadline, odiscounted FROM ORDERLIST WHERE mid = #{mid}
